data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pellizzari, Giuseppina, Hodgson, Chris (2007): A new species of Prionococcus (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Coccoidea: Coccidae) from Mexico, with a discussion of its affinities. Zootaxa 1481: 1-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176891
